# Project Website Repository

This is the main repository for the Project Website - a full-stack application demonstrating modern web development practices.

## Repository Structure

```
├── frontend/          # React frontend application
├── backend/          # Node.js + Express backend
├── python-engine/    # Python analysis and optimization engine
├── .github/          # GitHub configuration
└── docs/            # Documentation
```

## Quick Links

- [Contributing Guidelines](.github/CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [Frontend Setup](./frontend/README.md)
- [Backend Setup](./backend/README.md)
- [Python Engine Setup](./python-engine/README.md)

## Technology Stack

- **Frontend**: React 18, HTML5, CSS3
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL
- **Python**: PyTorch, OpenAI API
- **Deployment**: Vercel
- **Version Control**: GitHub

## Getting Started

See the main [README.md](./README.md) for detailed setup instructions.
